# image

**Instance Property**

The achievement’s artwork that you display when the player completes the achievement.

## Declaration

```swift
var image: NSImage? { get }
```

```swift
var image: UIImage? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is undefined until you load the image using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKAchievementDescription/loadImage(completionHandler:)] method.

## Reading and Writing Achievement Properties

- **identifier**: The string you enter in App Store Connect that uniquely identifies the achievement.
- **title**: A localized title for the achievement.
- **unachievedDescription**: A localized description of the achievement that you display when the player hasn’t completed the achievement.
- **achievedDescription**: A localized description of the achievement that you display when the player completes the achievement.
- **maximumPoints**: The number of points that the player earns when completing the achievement.
- **isHidden**: A Boolean value that states whether the achievement is initially visible to players.
- **isReplayable**: A Boolean value that states whether the player can earn the achievement multiple times.
- **rarityPercent**: The percentage of players of this game that earned the achievement.
